description: unique identifier for the parameter set consisting of model name, lake name, date of the start of calibration run, and parameter set

used model in the parameter set. This dataset contains simulations for Simstrat with parameter a_seich set to 0 and GOTM with parameter turb_param_k_min set to 1e-8. The model names are appended with '_r'
used lake in the parameter set
root mean squared error of the parameter set (deg. Celsius)
Nash-Sutcliffe model efficiency of the parameter set (dimensionless)
Pearson correlation coefficients for the parameter set (dimensionless)
bias of the parameter set (deg. Celsius)
mean absolute error of the parameter set (deg. Celsius)
normalized mean absolute error of the parameter set (dimensionless)
wind speed scaling factor (dimensionless) used in the parameter set
short wave radiation scaling factor (dimensionless) used in the parameter set
parameter value for bottom.h0b used for GOTM, if other model is used it will be NA
parameter value for turb_param_const_num used for GOTM, if other model is used it will be NA
parameter value for hgeo used for Simstrat, if other model is used it will be NA
parameter value for cd used for Simstrat, if other model is used it will be NA
light extinction coefficient (1/m) used in the parameter set
